channel.title: Blogs on Farhan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Farhan's Blog

item.title: Drupal
item.description: Drupal a CMS (Content Management System) which can be used to develop any type of application and does not require any programming for the front or backend.

item.title: SASS
item.description: Not to be confused for SaaS (software as a service), this technology is like the updated version of CSS which you can use along side Bootstrap as well as other tools and is not that complicated to understand if you understand CSS.
